This game works 100%. Thanks, Morck22 for another good release.


-- Note to new downloaders --

Just run it through abgx360 for SSv2 and DMI like any other game. YES, you need to flash your Xbox before you can play this or ANY backup game. If you don't know how to mod your Xbox, search Google or read the Jungleflasher tutorials. It's a bit more complicated than someone could tell you in a comment box.

I burned this twice because I thought the first one was messed up. when I chose exhibition game on the first disc I just get stuck on loading screen. tried burning a second disc and now when I try to enter tutorial/guide mode it does the same thing.

does it need any recent update or something?
edit: guide mode works one first disc but not exhibition and exhibition works on second disc but not guide mode.
